# `verifyEmailUsingToken(token)`

### Parameters
- `token`
  - type: `string`

### Returns
- `Promise<user>`, on submitting a valid token.

### Throws 
- [EMAIL_VERIFICATION_INVALID_TOKEN_ERROR](./../emailpassword/errors/email_verification_invalid_token_error)
- [GENERAL_ERROR](./../errors/general_error)
